snippet.title: The Island: In To The Mist 그 섬 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Check Out: https://store.steampowered.com/app/941650/The_Island_In_To_The_Mist/

'The Island: In To The Mist' is an adventure game. It includes basic features of adventure genre and add some new systems to interest you. You have been given a chance to experience a group of university students, who confined in the island. There is a terrific but interesting story you will see.

RELEASE DATE: 31 Jan, 2019
DEVELOPER: SUPER WAVE Studio
PUBLISHER: BADA Games
